title: How good is the Don Quixote English translated book version? - Quora
tags: Don Quixote (Novel) by Miguel De Cervantes

response.answer_text: Which translation, specifically? All foreign-language works that are considered important have multiple English translations throughout the English-speaking world, and the older the work is the more translations it will accrue. Don Quixote is absolutely no exception. I recommend you peruse Amazon or Goodreads or other similar sites and see what the reviews say for each edition.
The standard translation written by Samuel Putnam decades ago is still considered one of the best and extremely readable.Of course there have been others.
